refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the filter coefficients of a Hanning window of length M

listitem.para: real scalar, which will be the length of hanning window

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Return the filter coefficients of a Hanning window of length M. If the optional argument "periodic" is given, the periodic form of the window is returned. This is equivalent to the window of length M+1 with the last coefficient removed. The optional argument "symmetric" is equivalent to not specifying a second argument.
